item.description:
This only meetup in Boston that brings together nonprofits and businesses to work on collaboration and partnerships in an informative and fun format. We will be having a short presentation on social media and how it can benefit your organization. Every month we bring one local nonprofit into the spotlight and all the donations go directly to the organization. The spotlight will be on Notre Dame Education Center on 4/29/09. We always have wonderful FREE appetizers for all meetup members. Look forward to seeing you there!

Agenda:

6-6:30pm - Networking with food and drink
6:30;7:45pm - Short introductions, Monthly nonprofit spotlight, presentation (social media), answer one or two questions that will help the group collaborate and partner with each other
7:45-8pm - More Networking and collaborating

PS. Remember to bring your own name tag this will help brand your organization more effectively.

Sponsors of the evening:

Jobs In Nonprofits (www.jobsinnonprofits.com) and Vlora Restaurant (www.vloraboston.com)
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a name tag - Bring your own name tag please!

group.name: Social Impact Success Community Meetup Group

item.name: Social Impact Circle April Meetup
